snippet: As L Capital prepares to announce the closing of its third European fund, the private equity firm is eager to show that it follows its own path by investing in "affordable luxury."
abstract: As L Capital prepares to announce the closing of its third European fund, the private equity firm is eager to show that it follows its own path by investing in "affordable luxury."

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: A Buyout Fund, First Backed by LVMH, Carves Its Own Niche
